1.18.1.1.0: Added Copper Tools, Armor, Horse Armor, Doors, and Nugget.
1.18.1.1.1: Fixed Amethyst Cluster drops with Copper Pickaxe. Added compatibility tags.
1.18.1.1.2: Fixed block drops. Added Copper Bars and Medium Weighted Pressure Plate. Slightly tweaked armor item textures.
1.18.1.1.3: Made some copper items appear randomly in certain generated chests. Updated to Forge 39.0.55.
1.18.1.2.0: All blocks now oxidize with same eight variations as vanilla: (Unaffected, Exposed, Weathered, Oxidized, Waxed Unaffected, Waxed Exposed, Waxed Weathered, Waxed Oxidized). Slightly reduced loot found in chests.
